summary: This is a gift letter certifying that a donor has given a sum of money as a gift to be used for a down payment or closing costs on a home purchase. It confirms the gift is voluntary and no repayment is expected.
risks: Falsification of information in a Federally insured transaction is punishable by a fine of up to $10,000 and/or a prison term.
Statements submitted for the purpose of aiding the recipient to obtain a mortgage loan must be true, under penalty of U.S. Criminal Code Section 1010, Title 18, U.S.C.
